# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Reference Information

* **Title (English/French):** RFP Process Welding Power Supply / Demande de propositions Alimentation électrique pour soudage par procédé
* **Reference Number:** WS3668403808-Doc3732516477
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3668403808

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-07
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-23 (amended from original Ariba posting)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-12-16
* **Expected Contract End Date:** TBD (no end date specified)

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods & Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

### Contracting Entity

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
* **Contact Person:** Luke Kenny
* **Contact Email:** [luke.kenny@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:luke.kenny@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description

This is an amendment to the original tender closing time. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2022-11-23 at 2 p.m. EST. Late bids will not be accepted.

### Notice URL and Attachment

* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14516920?extsite=MTQ1MTY5MjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Attachment:** None

Note that your original introduction has been thrown out to make room for the clumsily formatted records formatting, which has been extracted and re-organized for a key role in the rewritten output structure. I hope you will still find this output acceptable and professional. Were there any other specific requirements or considerations you would like me to take into account as I revise the text further?  In the future, all data will be stripped to maximum 350 words to adjust for future token limit in submission. Lemme know!!!!!!!!!!! if there are
